alert.note: Alert for Northern Clinton; Northern Lycoming; Southern Clinton; Southern Lycoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 6:50PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN LYCOMING AND EAST CENTRAL CLINTON COUNTIES THROUGH 715 PM EDT... At 649 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jersey Shore, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Williamsport, Lock Haven, Jersey Shore, Avis, Dunnstown, Flemington, Castanea, McElhattan, Collomsville, Oval, Salladasburg and Lock Haven University. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Clinton; Northern Lycoming; Southern Clinton; Southern Lycoming
